Official Languages | blank_info_sec1 = Sinhala, Tamil | website = | footnotes = }} Colombo District (; ) is one of the 25 districts of Sri Lanka. Districts are the second-level administrative divisions of the country. ==Geography== Colombo District is in the south west of Sri Lanka.
